availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James A. Mingee (Mason County, Kentucky, student)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, student. Kentucky native. Son of James Mingee and Catherine Mingee. Married to Malinda Clift Mingee. Father of Mary E. Mingee and Newton T. Mingee. Student in Mason County in 1860. Farmer in Bourbon County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 3, p. 263.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Germantown District, p. 324A.
Ohio Marriage Records, Various Courthouses, Hamilton County Marriages, 1905, Film #000355076, p. 351, p. 427 of microfilm.
_Find A Grave, "J. A. Mingee (1844-1916)," Memorial #58179358, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/58179358 (accessed February 21, 2019).
